sentences.sContent: Then on to our old haunt, the hazel grove.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then on to our old haunt, the hazel grove.
sentences.sCn: 接着，到我们经常去的小榛树林。

sentences.sContent: Natural carnival, life of the party, Our after the sentiment, smart touch gladdening the heart and refreshing the mind, Strong hazel incense bring multiple taste, suddenly lifeincomparable.
sentences.sContent_eng: Natural carnival, life of the party, Our after the sentiment, smart touch gladdening the heart and refreshing the mind, Strong hazel incense bring multiple taste, suddenly lifeincomparable.
sentences.sCn: 自然的狂欢，生命的派对， 浓情后的感悟，灵动的碰触沁人心脾， 浓厚榛香带来多重口感，煞那间生命无与伦比。

trans.tranOther: a small tree that produces nuts
hazel eyes are a green-brown colour
